structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS

law.text: The fiscal court of counties containing a city of the first class may, in addition to the audits made by the auditor and assistant auditor, employ an independent firm of certified public accountants to audit accounts of all county officers not oftener than once in any fiscal year.
law.history: Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 1851b-13.
